channel.title: Calculating the damange done based on bonuses
channel.description: Does anyone know how i would calculate the damage done based off the bonuses in Item.cfg? because in my skilling server im trying to add pking but the bonuses dont seem to show up in game even though i edit them in Items.cfg. PLEASE HELPP!

item.title: Calculating the damange done based on bonuses
item.dc:creator: @mu68446346 mu68446346
item.description:
@mu68446346 wrote:

i even tried taking a pking sources Item.cfg with all the correct bonuses and it still doenst work.
PLEASE HELP ME!

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating the damange done based on bonuses

item.title: Calculating the damange done based on bonuses
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Rjthebear:

did u compile?

[quote=“orcashark, post:4, topic:356612”]Turn server OFFLINE.
Compile
Close
Turn BACK ONLINE.
Should work fine.[/quote]
Erm… you don’t have to compile when you changed a .cfg file?..

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating the damange done based on bonuses

i even tried taking a pking sources Item.cfg with all the correct bonuses and it still doenst work.
